website_summaries.verdict: This alcohol-free shampoo  is good for both hair and the environment, this top-of-the-line hair strengthening shampoo is free of not only alcohol, but sulfates and gluten as well.
pros: Restores life to thin or limp hair using organic ingredients
this alcohol-free shampoo is vegan and cruelty-free
Safe for all hair types, including color-treated
Users report seeing results after only a couple of weeks
Smells great and rinses clean with no residue weighing down hair after rinsing out
cons: Some users don't like that it doesn't lather well
Higher price point will deter anyone not completely invested in the ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazed by how quickly I started seeing the results. I was ready for at least two months of trying to stop my hair loss. Laritelle treatment didn't make me wait this long. It took about 10 treatments for me to notice a drastic change. Exceeded my expectations by far. I finally found time to upload pictures showing the progress. You can see little black dots of hair that's about to start growing. I'm still amazed and in awe.
customer_reviews.author: Enid

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes even my color treated hair feel lush and silky. I bought one for myself and one for my 20 year old grand daughter. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It will restore your hair to healthy shiny perfection. I have long hair and live in the desert. The conditions can be harsh. But my hair looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how this product has helped with hair growth
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Laritelle Organic Shampoo and Conditioner for over a year now. My hair didn't fully grow back after 6 rounds of chemo and I tried several over the counter products that damaged/dried my hair and burned my scalp. Laritelle was recommended to me by a friend. I have had amazing success with hair growth and a lot less hair loss and I love the fragrance too!!! The conditioner is very light, but detangles very well and I am not putting chemicals on my head anymore!!! I would highly recommend these product to everyone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best conditioner ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this conitioner!! I was having trouble with thinning, falling hair, frizzy hair, I am in my late 50's. I thought I'd try this after reading the reviews. The first time I used it, I really noticed a wonderful change in the texture of my hair. I used the shampoo too. Even though my hair is thin and fine, the conditioner does not weigh my hair down. I love the way it makes my hair feel. My hair is shinier, more manageable, feels thicker, full of body, feels great and I'm not losing hair like I was. And I really love the smell, very natural.
customer_reviews.author: feral75

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell however my body doesn't respond well to ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this causes my scalp to become very irritated and scab. I like the smell however my body doesn't respond well to something in it.
customer_reviews.author: Pupmom

customer_reviews.title: RELIEF!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. But I was a bit desperate and did not want to go on medication. My symptoms were intense hot flashes, flushing, sweating. About 20 a day and into the night. Btw, sugar and alcohol exacerbate my intensity and frequency. A friend said a co-worker had good results with this oil. What the heck? Day 1 a mild reduction. About day 4 with religious application - no more symptoms! If you're suffering, buy this product immediately (pump the brakes on sugar and alcohol too)!
customer_reviews.author: AD Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Nothing short of a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with hair loss and have been using all different kinds of shampoo to help it. The problem with it is it destroyed my hair! Dry, frizzy, breaking and more hair loss. I just bought this and used it twice in a row....overnight. Today my hair is soft, light and silky! No hair loss when combing after the shower, and no hair in the drain! I will continue to use this regularly. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Love the shampoo, conditioner & essential oil scalp & hair treatment. In just 1 week I have my youthful shine back in my hair, my fine thinning hair has never looked fuller and it just feels so clean. All over the counter products for fine thinning hair use zinc and according to DNA tests my doctor ran, my body reacts adversely to zinc. I was thrilled to find your line of chemical free products and even more thrilled when I started using them. I recommend them to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo!! I was having trouble with thinning, falling hair, frizzy hair, I am in my late 50's. I thought I'd try this after reading the reviews. The first time I used it, I really noticed a wonderful change in the texture of my hair. I used the conditioner too, even though my hair is thin and fine, the conditioner does not weigh my hair down. I love the way it makes my hair feel. My hair is shinier, more manageable, feels thicker, full of body, feels great and I'm not losing hair like I was. And I really love the smell, very natural.
customer_reviews.author: feral75

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman in my late fifties. Recently, I noticed my hair thinning on the top. (My late mother had this problem as well.) After reading up on products to reverse this process, I bought Laritelle Organic Shampoo. My hairstylist has noticed that my hair had thickened. And I feel more confident. The price is steep, but it is money well spent. And the smell is pleasing. New users should note the shampoo is thin compared to other shampoos. I squirt the product a few times into my hand and quickly apply it to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love this Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Laritelle Organic Shampoo since Dec 2017. I have fine, thinning hair that tends to get oily quickly and my scalp itches from breakouts from eczema. I have been using Silk Velvet and can tell that it has been working for me. I am very pleased with this product! It leaves my hair fuller, shinier, fewer oily hair days and my scalp doesn't itch as much. It seems to dry up my eczema. Even my beautician has remarked on seeing new hair growth! I just ordered my second bottle/17+ oz. Since I keep my hair short this bottle has lasted for nearly 2 years! I really recommend you give this shampoo a try!
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Quong

customer_reviews.title: Great De-tangler for delicate fragile hair
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of natural conditioners... this one is the best for de-tangling ... which I assume has helped at least some with hair loss. Great variety of scents also... including unscented for those that are super sensitive to fragrances. It is pricey... and I'm not sure if it has helped with growth... but I'll continue to use as long as I can afford it. Been making some dietary changes as well... along with reduction/elimination of certain RX that have hair loss as a side effect. Fingers Crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Allison R.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am losing hair in the front. I know genetics plays a part, but so does using shampoo with sodium as one of the ingredients. Laritelle does not contain sodium. After only one use, my hair looked full again. You can't go wrong with this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Gerri E. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this product. I don’t like the smell or liquid consistency. Because of how liquidy it is, the product runs out very quickly. I also didn’t like the scent but it was manageable. But all-in-all, I didn’t really see a difference in my hair. If anything I think it might’ve made it a little drier.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Update! Bad packaging, product seems adequate
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo seems ok, not sure if it works yet as far as hair loss, but my hair feels very clean. I was very dissatisfied with with the pump that came with the bottle. You assume when you pay this much for a product the packaging would be comparable. I had to break the pump to get it to work well enough to pump. The company contacted me after this review and sent me new pumps! They work great. Also I have been using the shampoo for a few weeks now and my hair loss has slowed down. I use it everyday and my hair looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: chemisme

customer_reviews.title: Decreasing hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this conditioner for over 3 months now and I have no plans to stop. The bottle is large, it leaves my hair shiny, and i've experienced less breakage since using. Most significantly, I have noticed a significant decrease in the amount of my hair that falls out in the shower. Where I used to loose about 50 strands per shower, I now lose 20. Even my everyday hair shedding has decreased. I can't say i've noticed any new growth, but time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit weary about spending this kind of money for shampoo/conditioner but I have been losing alot of hair during the day and especially in the shower. I have tried shampoos with collagen or biotin but nothing seemed to work. I purchased this early October and it's been almost a month and I have seen a big difference with not losing as much hair during the day and when showering. I can also see my baby hair start to really grow out. I was very surprised how fast it's working.
customer_reviews.author: Lily D.

customer_reviews.title: Biggest disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve ever been more disappointed by a hair product. I recently had some minor alopecia and decided to shell out for this highly reviewed shampoo that seems to help with hair growth. But I’ve been trying to adjust to this product for 3 months now and can safely say it’s garbage. It does smell good, and the list of ingredients is very enticing. But it leaves my hair heavy and greasy with a thick residue stuck in it. I haven’t noticed any hair growth, either. I wanted so badly for this to work, especially considering the price, but this is honestly some of the worst shampoo I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: Augie Craig

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of Laritelle Organic Shampoo and Conditioner. My hair is noticeably thicker and softer because of my continuous use of this product. Since there is no build up I am able to use this product every time I shampoo and condition my hair. I am a truely a satisfied customer. Barbara, Somerset, NJ
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Leave's my hair fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Laritelle shampoo and conditioner. While it is pricey compared to store brands, it is well worth the extra money. I don't have to use as much as the store brand and my first set lasted about 6 months. I originally bought this because I was having a problem with my hair thinning at my temples and center part. I'm super happy to say my hair is filling back in! An added bonus is I love the way it smells! Thank you Laritelle!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Kersey

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is organic
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is organic. My hair feels very clean after i use the shampoo and then very soft and healthy after I apply the conditioner. I obviosuly have not used this long enough to determine whether it has helped with the hair loss and breakage, but will be sure to update this review accordingly. I really appreciate the manufacturer's ethos of organic, locally made products with acknowledgement of the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Jway

customer_reviews.title: Get healthy, shiny hair.
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer, only used shampoo/conditioner once and I really, really liked how it treated my hair. Expensive for average family daily use, but I have only ever needed to wash my hair once per week and I do come from family of hairdressers in London, UK. I would strongly suggest you buy both shampoo and conditioner once, see how it performs on your hair. I believe you get what you pay for - so spoil yourselves and try product. Sincerely.
customer_reviews.author: Ladygolfer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for a few weeks, I noticed that I am not losing as much hair. What really thrilled me is that my receding hairline is filling in, just a little bit, but I'm hoping to see more growth as time goes on. My hair is silkier, too. The product is very low sudsing, and somewhat thin compared to regular shampoo, so I feel as though I am using more than I normally would with a standard shampoo. Despite that, it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like Water
customer_reviews.text: Very pricey and runs out of your hands like water. Hard to get it on my head since I lose the majority of the product in the shower before it reaches my scalp. Will not buy this again. What a waste of product and money. I've only used it a few times so I can't say if it helps with shedding.
customer_reviews.author: MMi

customer_reviews.title: the conditioner is great but super thick can not pump
customer_reviews.text: I have used this twice .....find it really seems to be helping with my hair loss is less.....the conditioner is great but super thick can not pump .....so I squeeze the bottle to get it out and put into a cup and add water it works great that way! I would of given 5 stars except the conditioner is super thick and can not pump it........
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product helped me get calmer and have better sleep. It was purchased and intended to help with hormones and thus hair growth. But I got more than that. I do recommend this balancing oil to other men as well.
customer_reviews.author: Enid

customer_reviews.title: This is great if you wash your hair daily
customer_reviews.text: My disappointment with this product is the fact that I paid so much and it makes my hair really greasy and weighs it down. I’m not one to wash daily but I have to or my scalp gets itchy and feels disgusting if I don’t with this, so I have to use another shampoo and conditioner to feel like I’ve cleaned my hair and scalp. Truly disappointing considering how much I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Heather I. Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I have been using it for a week ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have been using it for a week and my hair is very clean and soft. Hopefully it will stop the hair loss, I guess is to soon to tell. Wish the bottles were bigger size because I don't think it's going to last me 2 months. But like what I said, is to soon to tell if really stop hair lost.
customer_reviews.author: Danelly Parra

customer_reviews.title: It's alright...
customer_reviews.text: It's OK...haven't really noticed that it helps nourish my hair (have naturally curly/wavy hair) as expected . Think it's really expensive to just work OK. Appreciate the ingredients but the formula isn't quite right in my opinion. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as it smells!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner works as good as it smells. I had a few thin patches that doctors suggested were from stress or an autoimmune issue. Not sure and really don’t care, because this product worked. Period. The price may seem steep but it really goes a long way, and when I get to the bottom of the container I mix with some water to stretch the remaining before I can order more. This is my first Amazon review after hundreds of orders in the past several years. I like this product that much!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for those that suffer from allergies or dermatitis
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for those that suffer from allergies or dermatitis. I have these issues and this has been a great solution for me. I have a hard time finding shampoos and conditioners that will not cause a reaction. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Passion 4 Style

customer_reviews.title: love trying new products, especially when they work
customer_reviews.text: I tried many other brands of all natural hair conditioners. Including many organic ones. Laritelle really stands out from the rest. Quality / bottle size / ingredients / price / effect on my hair are simply unbeatable. After 2.5 months of using Laritelle products (fertile roots hair oil+fertile roots shampoo+fertile roots conditioner) I see about 2 inches of outgrowth. I stopped dyeing my hair because of the hair loss. But now will resume by adding Laritelle Hair Oil to my hair color.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane

customer_reviews.title: like this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like the natural and chemical free Latrielle shampoo and conditioner. The shampoo is a bit drying to my hair, but my scalp feels very clean and has fewer flakes after three uses. I like the conditioner even more: it leaves my hair so soft. I only wish the price was less, but the cheap stuff is full of chemicals and ingredients I want to avoid. Overall, I am pleased and will just use the Laritelle products as a special indulgence.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS H.

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and makes my hair feel thicker!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to help with hair fall. It's too early to know for sure if it will help with hair growth but last night after showering I flipped my hair over and pulled through to get any loose hair out-there wasn't any! Nothing in the drain either! I am looking forward to see what happens after I've used these products more than a week! I am expecting great results!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I think I like this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I think I like this shampoo? I wish it would suds better - I tend to want to use too much because I'm used to shampoos that do make more suds, and it really doesn't do that, but it seems to clean well, and I like the smell. As far as all the other claims for thicker hair, less hair loss, and less frizzing - I'm not so sure? I do not see any less frizzing, but maybe less hair loss in the shower and on my hair brush, and I do think my hair may look a litter thicker, and feels cleaner longer? I haven't used it that long, so I'm still kind of one the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love laritelle organic shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and the conditioner also. My hair feels so smooth aand it has stopped my hair from falling out as much . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Burns

customer_reviews.title: Test multiple products before making this your go to.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a trial to see how Laritelle products affect my hair, and because I'm on the search for a good organic hair product. It's great and my hair feels good after. I would recommend trying other products though because this one is priced really high and I found others to have the same clean feel after.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell92

customer_reviews.title: I love Laritelle Shampoos and Conditioners
customer_reviews.text: I love Laritelle Shampoos and Conditioners! I used to have to wash my oily hair every day. After using for a few months I can go 2-3 days without shampooing. It has also helped with itchy scalp. The only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is because I didn't like the smell of this one as much as the others.
customer_reviews.author: ShariD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to try this product I am so happy My hair absorbed this with no oily feeling Just refreshed and quenched I kept it on overnight and now my pillow smells like heaven I can't say enough about Laritelle These formulas are a gift from the universe Priced right as a little goes a long way in every respect Love the sustainable packaging simple clean and organic Happy Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: wabi sabi

customer_reviews.title: It takes more time to work through and lather but I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Laritelle shampoo and conditioners have totally improved my scalp and hair! Before I had to wash my oily hair every day. Now I can go 2-3 days between shampoos. Also has helped with itchy, flaky scalp. It takes more time to work through and lather but I highly recommend this product! Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: ShariD

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to be super critical given the price of the product but I have to say I absolutely love this stuff. I personally haven't lost much hair I just wanted healthier hair with less breakage and in just a few weeks of use I can tell a huge difference. Great smell great consistency.
customer_reviews.author: LadyInVa

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for this product. It works well, as described. I only use this product twice per month, that is all I need it personally. It does what its supposed to do. Makes your hair stronger and hair looks lovely once I blow dry it. Leaves it shining. I liked it enough that now I bought the Laritelle shampoo too. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel9

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage expensive af but does nothing. If you are shedding and looking for something to stop hair loss, this product does nothing but cost you a lot of money. My hair shed even more from day one. I kept going but had to stop bc I was shedding too much.
customer_reviews.author: tam nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this organic GREAT quality shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner are great! The scent is refreshing and uplifting and it cleans and mosturizes my hair. My hair was looking very thin, due to hair coloring, and hormonal hair loss after giving birth. After using the full bottle of diamond strength my hair is looking full and happy again! I decided to purchase Natures love this time to try out a different scent and a new combination of ingriedents. So far so good! Natures love is more spicy smelling, like cinnamon. My hair looks great, shiny and bouncy again. I have a lot of fine hair with a natural wave.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn c.

customer_reviews.title: No more dandruff!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously one of the best hair products I have ever used! I’ve always had a head full of hair but recently noticed some thinning. I also have had some dandruff like I’ve never had before, which is embarrassing! I would scrub my hair but still have the dandruff issue. I used these products today for the first time and I swear my dandruff is gone!!! My hair feels so soft and clean! I am amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great results with this product
customer_reviews.text: Great results with this product, better by any other brand by far, truly restores hair, with shine and make it look more abundant, strengthen the hair if you have thin hair, no cons so far
customer_reviews.author: C. Deras

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Feeds my skin! My skin and hands love this oil! It has a pleasant smell and is easy to apply. I use 3 drops and rub it in under my thyroid. I've only been using it for 3 weeks but so far my hormones seem a little more balanced. No hot flashes and my mood is more stable :)
customer_reviews.author: All_Shop

customer_reviews.title: The pump does not reach to the bottom of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The pump does not reach to the bottom of the bottle, so I had to unscrew the shampoo for every use. Also, it does not rinse in well.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 12 months. I live in the high desert of the southwest and it is very dry here. I am 68 and my hair had been thinning and drying over the last year or so until it was like straw. None of the store bought products I tried made any difference. This product has definitely helped. My hair is softer and has begun to softly shine again. Because of the success, I have also begun using their shampoo and conditioner. It is also very good. These products are a little expensive but, in my opinion, definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Afield

customer_reviews.title: Not for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Not for me; I sent it back. Its a good Company. The shampoo dried out my hair and tangled it. The Conditioner didn't help. For a different type of hair, it would probably be better; I do have baby-fine, Nordic hair. I lost a lot of hair, so the 'fertile roots' wasn't my experience. Soft water areas might be better. It didn't work with hard water.
customer_reviews.author: JS9

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully and smells amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this shampoo a few days ago and I LOVE it. The aroma is incredible. The shampoo is a low suds style, which I believe is better for our hair. My hair looks very clean and shiny as a result. I'm ordering the conditioner to complete the process of this great line of hair care.
customer_reviews.author: jodigirl11

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy laritelle shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Laritelle shampoo and it is like water and my hair fell out more than before. I'm almost positive that I was sent a bad batch and will never purchase this shampoo again. It definitively was a waste of money. Don't buy this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: cindy wunstell

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have used this conditioner for years. I mainly need something natural and completely unscented and this fits the bill. Just know it will get moldy if the container is in your bathroom for a months-it’s a large container- I’m assuming it’s because it’s organic. So I transfer some into a smaller container for the bath... and put the original bottle in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: It does have a strong fragrance- it's not good or bad
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the shampoo and conditioner for about a week. I can't say if it is or isn't helping with my hair loss yet. It does have a strong fragrance- it's not good or bad, just stronger than I am used to in my hair care products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Orr

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo ever??
customer_reviews.text: Just a superb product. Probably costs more than what most shampoos like this do, but in my opinion you get more than what you pay for. Smells great, feels really nice while it’s in your hair, and I noticed improvement after only about 10 days, maybe less than that. My go-to company for any hair products from now on, I can’t imagine people being disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: OliveBranch222

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My scalp feels nice and clean - doesn't feel dry or oily. Went four days, as an experiment without shampooing and my scalp still felt fresh! Went back to washing hair every other day but if I miss a day or two my scalp doesn't feel dirty or itchy... Bought the small travel size just to try out and will buy more. It is on the pricey side but think it's worth it. I've tried many other expensive shampoos and haven't felt a difference. Very happy w/ the shampoo and the conditioner!
customer_reviews.author: J.O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today as it is too soon to talk about hair growth I can say that after 1 wash my hair has never felt as healthy as it does right now. Soft and shiny and I am very happy with the purchase and if it helps with the growth I will be a lifetime buyer!
customer_reviews.author: KellyG

customer_reviews.title: no skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: My scalp has been very irritated by various shampoos and conditioners over the past few years, and finally I found a shampoo that does not irritate my scalp. It is very expensive, but at least there is improvement. I very much recommend purchasing conditioner, otherwise your hair feels like straw. Also, it is hard to lather this product.
customer_reviews.author: Honest_Customer

customer_reviews.title: My hair looks great. I have more volume than with the other ...
customer_reviews.text: My hair looks great. I have more volume than with the other similar shampoo/conditioner I’ve used and I have new little hairs coming in after only a few weeks. The texture is better and it smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: JoyP

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: Horrible scent, it smells like medicine to me. I’ve used herbal shampoos before but this smell was very bad. I still kept it hoping it would stop my hair loss, however it took me a month and a half to finish the bottle and I didn’t not see a change in my hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews. It was a waste of money. The smIall bottle of solution that you use after you wash and condition your scalp is watery. I've used this product for two months. No hair growth as been achieved at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mossie Burks

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and hair has great body!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the smell and how my hair feels from using it. I will update after a few weeks with any progress on the thinning hair. Also I was missing the pump for my conditioner and their customer service responded immediately and shipped me a replacement! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Delicious scent and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really love the scent of the shampoo and my hit feels really soft after using it. I’m still getting used to the product hut I think it was a welcome change to my hair routine. Still looking forward to hopefully added growth with continuous use! Mostly, I wang to commend their customer service! My bottle arrived and the pump was faulty so I ended up losing some of the product. I contacted them simply asking for a replacement for the pump itself but they sent me an all new shampoo! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Coleman

customer_reviews.title: however I like the texture of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a couple times, however I like the texture of my hair. It suds nicely and my hair feels stronger and doesn't shed as much. I have recommended it to 1 friend and 1 niece so far. I'm about to discontinue using any other shampoo or conditioner products.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Very happy..
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff!! I am using this along with the conditioner and hair oil and my hair has never felt better, after only 2 uses!
customer_reviews.author: MBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This may be a high-quality product, and I appreciate the organic ingredients. It probably can't hurt to use it. But there was zero improvement for me on the strengthening/stopping hair loss front, even after 10+ weeks of use. May work for some, but it's an expensive product, so not sure I'd recommend the experiment.
customer_reviews.author: ninagi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely not worth nearly 100.00 to buy. I'm super disappointed that I am still in search of a product that would stimulate hair growth and body. This product made my hair feel awful. It was super limp, greasy at the roots, lifeless, dull and the smell isn't very great. The product was watery and didn't lather at all. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pascucci

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for the ingredients. Lose all the other stars for the scent and lack of larger. I just don’t love this product. I think I can find better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Delaram Aghili

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what is says .... makes my hair feel thicker and I've noticed new hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: I followed this products instructions and still no improvement. It smells ok, a little to hippieish for my taste. I’d spend your money on other products that are higher quality and actually have proof of results.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and no results.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hope but was sadly disappointed. The shampoo dried my hair and it fell out more than before. I used it 3 times and each time a lot of my hair was in the drain. The photo is from my first use. Never had that much hair in the drain. The conditioner felt nice and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Beagle Lady

customer_reviews.title: I actually like this conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this conditioner, it smells good, and seems to work good, and you don't have to use much of it, but it is almost impossible to get it out of the bottle, because it is so thick. The pump thing does not work at all, matter of fact my broke almost immediately - it should come in a squeeze bottle, or something easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the hype!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for how great it is. Likely the best shampoo you’ll ever buy, no exaggeration. Won’t be buying any other brands now.
customer_reviews.author: OliveBranch222

customer_reviews.title: To soon to tell if this will thicken my hair!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s too soon to tell if this will make my hair thicker, however I do like how it makes my hair feel. I wish it wasn’t so expensive, not sure I can afford to keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smelling, haven't used long enough to experience anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant smelling, haven't used long enough to experience anything miraculous but it seems to leave hair dryer and brittle. Going back to my other shampoo to see if this resolves this situation which seemed to happen when switching shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: CJA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nourishment for the hair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nourishment for the hair. After washingI just put some in the palm Of my hand and squeeze it through and leave it IN.
customer_reviews.author: Islander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair super shiny. Not sure if it is helping with the hair loss yet.
customer_reviews.author: mcdmtt1

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Aveda fan for years,but I have broken up with them and will be staying with this product line. Within a week I noticed a thicker texture to my hair and the thinning spots not that obvious any more. Laritelle also has that very pleasant herbal aroma to that makes me look forward to washing my hair. Glad I found Laritelle on Amazon and the articles on best hair products.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Dean Seagle

customer_reviews.title: Its works
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product upon my brothers results. He has had thinning hair since becoming vegan and has used this product to fortify his locks. I have gotten the same product and so far no growth is present but I just purchased too. I have,however, noticed that my hair has stopped shedding almost instantly. Can't wait to see the changes in my hair. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Criscolea

customer_reviews.title: Love Both the Shampoo and Cream Rinse
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and cream rinse. It works great for my hair. Yes, it is expensive, but I don't use much and it take out an annoying curl area that is only on one part of my scalp and with the cream rinse results in a soft silky feel to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful! Have been using since December. Don't know if it's working but I continue to use
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I love Laritelle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes my hair grow insanely fast. I used to get cuts every month, now it's every 2 weeks. I started using it just because it was all natural and I'm happy with it as a regular shampoo. If you need to grow out your hair though, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: There is a noticeable improvement in my hairs texture since using the shampoo, conditioner and hair oil. My hair used to be dry and break off easily. Since I started using the system, my has become stronger and stretchy. Stretchy=less breakage. The smell can be strong for the oil, but it is worth it and you'll get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! I can tell the difference in my hair only after 1 month. My hair is softer and baby hairs are popping up everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Nessavjs

customer_reviews.title: Recommended organic!
customer_reviews.text: This Laritelle shampoo is amazing! It is completely organic and you can tell the difference when you use it because it’s light and doesn’t weigh down your hair. Goes well with the matching conditioner and a leave-in organic oil afterwards. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a completely organic shampoo and conditioner!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: shampoo - I returned
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product made my hair very dry and brittle. I had to use a very good conditioner after using the shampoo so That I didn't do damage to my hair. I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn Ottsman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for 2 months and it did nothing to help my hair shedding- if anything I lost MORE hair. This photo was taken after my last shower- insane...switching to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: E. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Nourish and grow hair after Chemotherapy
customer_reviews.text: The smell is pleasantly peppery my hair is really soft and it is growing; in conjunction with Castor and Mustard oil nourishing my hair .
customer_reviews.author: isabel w padilla

customer_reviews.title: Left my hair feeling great and a great smell.
customer_reviews.text: Although the shampoo does not lather as most off the shelf type shampoos, it is wonderful. My scalp feels better, I still have some hair loss when combing through after a shower, but the shampoo and conditioner both leave my hair feeling great and my scalp feeling even better. Not tingly or anything like that, but just very clean. Smells fabulous. I will be continuing to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Alexander

customer_reviews.title: So far I have been very much enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: The product so is pretty nice, I have only been useing for about a week now so I don’t know how I’m the long term it will hold up but as of right now it has left my hair looking less oily and has a really pleasing aroma to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very Watery
customer_reviews.text: I do not normally like to leave a negative review but since this was so expensive I thought I should jot down my thoughts. The Shampoo is extremely watery. I pump it in my hand and it drains through my fingers. I think would like it if it were thicker. Maybe something went wrong with the batch - I don't know. I wanted to let seller know but I kept forgetting so I apologize for that.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed by these products. I puedhas d the shampoo and conditioner after reading the reviews. I didn’t notice any change with my hair and I wouldn’t spend all this money on it again.
customer_reviews.author: Delaram Aghili

customer_reviews.title: Good oil
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this oil. I am new to oils and this one has eliminated my hot flashes and keeps me balanced. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It strengthening and gives shine...
customer_reviews.text: I had a disaster hair salon day a couple months ago. I have tried multiple products. A random lady at a nail salon said I’m using this. I’ve bought everything, so why not try it. I’m so impressed. I will buy again and again. Thank thank you for giving me back the hair i knew was there. It’s the best of many...I mean many. .
customer_reviews.author: Crystal heflin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Starting using Laritelle Organic Hormonal Balance and Thyroid Support treatment 1 oz size on May, 2018 and been using it daily and it works. Please continue making this product.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: It does make my hair more full but it's also pricey
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo and conditioner because it does, indeed, fill out my hair. After using it, my hair is thicker and fuller than it was before. The only downside is it's pretty pricey compared to regular shampoos and conditioners. Otherwise, I recommend it for anyone, like me, who is noticing a receding hairline and would like to cut things off before they get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Wiltfong

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely see a difference, my hair looks fuller and hairline is filling in... Wasn't expecting such good results.
customer_reviews.author: amt23

customer_reviews.title: Good but won't dispense properly
customer_reviews.text: I love these but the one thing that wasn't so good was the conditioner was too thick to dispense! Not sure I'm noticing any improvement with hair loss but it's only lyrics been a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: djembek

customer_reviews.title: Love this conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really wonderful conditioner. It makes your hair very soft without weighing it down, and eliminates tangles. I have very fine, damaged hair and it makes it look full and healthy. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

product_meta.title: Laritelle Organic Shampoo, Fortifying, Strengthening and Rejuvenating, Stops Hair Shedding, Promotes New Hair Growth, Ayurvedic Herbs, Lavender, Ginger, Rosemary, Patchouli and Cloves, 17.5 oz
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Fertile Roots| Size:Shampoo 17.5 OunceThis hair strengthening, clarifying, hydrating, nourishing and balancing shampoo formulated with 100% pure, highest quality certified organic / kosher certified / wild crafted ingredients is gentle enough for everyday use for all hair types. Stimulates the scalp and hair follicles, increasing blood circulation, enhancing hair growth and preventing hair loss. Promotes shiny, healthy, clean hair. Filled with powerful antioxidants improving color retention and maintaining the health and integrity of hair. Mitigates the damage from both coloring and heat processes. Organic hibiscus stops hair fall, stimulates hair follicles enhancing hair growth and restoring weakened and damaged hair while slowing down graying process. Antioxidants-rich organic ayurvedic herbs, bhringaraj, gotu kola and amla, strengthen and protect the hair while rejuvenating, moisturizing and conditioning the hair and scalp, adding luster and shine, fighting gray hair and split ends. Organic lavender, ginger, rosemary, patchouli and cloves help to promote hair growth, stimulate the scalp and the roots. Clary sage boosts hair growth, strengthens the hair on the cellular level, prevents premature hair loss, balances scalp oils, adds luster and shine.
feature_bullets: FIGHTS HAIR LOSS & PROMOTES HEALTHY HAIR GROWTH. Antioxidants-rich organic Ayurvedic herbs, Lavender, Ginger, Rosemary, Patchouli and Cloves help to promote hair growth, strengthen hair, stimulate the scalp and the roots, rejuvenate hair follicles.

Clary Sage HELPS TO STRENGTHEN THE HAIR ON CELLULAR LEVEL, prevent premature hair loss, balance scalp oils, adding luster and shine. SAFE FOR COLOR-TREATED HAIR. Extra kind and gentle to your scalp and hair. Nourishing for all hair types.

MADE WITH 100% PURE, HIGHEST QUALITY INGREDIENTS. Formulated with 75% Certified Organic & 25% Wildcrafted / Naturally Derived Ingredients sourced from plants that have not been sprayed or treated with any chemicals. HAND POURED WITH LOVE AND EXTRA CARE.

EARTH FRIENDLY, SAFE AND NON-TOXIC. NO HARMFUL CHEMICALS USED - Contains NO SLS, sulfates, alcohol, parabens, gluten, phthalates. GMO-free. Not tested on animals. PETA certified VEGAN and CRUELTY-FREE. Packaged in recyclable BPA-FREE plastic containers.

BALANCES AND SUPPORTS THE ROOT CHAKRA, which in turn helps to promote healing and wellness, maintain physical, spiritual and emotional health. PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA in small batches to keep quality fresh and clean.
